result.arabic_text: ۞ قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Bwira ababangikanyamana uti: “Umumalayika ajejwe urupfu ari na we abashinzwe, azobakuramwo imishaha ikiringo co kubaho kwanyu nicahera, muce mupfa, hanyuma musubizwe ku Mana yanyu Rurema Allah kugira Ibahembere ivyo mwakoze; ineza ku ciza canke inabi ku kibi”.
